thread.title: Jawbone launches UP Move, UP2 and UP3 fitness trackers in India
thread.title_full: Jawbone launches UP Move, UP2 and UP3 fitness trackers in India

title: Jawbone launches UP Move, UP2 and UP3 fitness trackers in India
text: Jawbone launches UP Move, UP2 and UP3 fitness trackers in India TOI Tech | Sep 9, 2015, 05.13 PM IST UP Move is priced at Rs 4,999, UP2 at Rs 9,999 and UP 3 at Rs 14,999. RELATED NEW DELHI: Wearables and accessories maker Jawbone has launched its UP activity trackers in India. The range of UP products, including UP Move, UP2 and UP3, is now available exclusively on Amazon.in. UP Move is priced at Rs 4,999, UP2 at Rs 9,999 and UP3 at Rs 14,999. Jawbone's UP fitness trackers help users track their sleep, movement and diet. According to the company, the UP system features advanced algorithms, an app, and partner integrations that work together to help users learn more about themselves and live better. The UP app is powered by Smart Coach - Jawbone's intelligent coaching system which turns data into personalised guidance, giving user's actionable insights and challenges to help improve their sleep, activity and diet. The UP activity trackers connect wirelessly to iOS and Android devices via Bluetooth Smart to give users real-time progress reports. The UP app encourages and motivates users to make minor improvements that can turn into long-term-progress - all based on unique data from Jawbone's hardware. The UP Move boats of a stylish design and is available in five colours. It offers six months of battery life and is powered by MotionX technology to provide a comprehensive summary of user's daily progress, including steps and sleep. It includes the pod-style tracking device, a corresponding clip and a replaceable battery, and comes in a selection of five tracker, clip, and wrist strap colour combinations. The UP2 caters to those looking for the next level up with a wristband tracker. In addition to offering the same features as UP Move, UP2 has a vibrating motor to give users Smart Alarm features and personalised reminders throughout the day as well as automatic sleep tracking. UP2 is a slim activity tracker and offers up to ten days of battery life. The UP3 is a sleek, low profile wristband that captures resting and passive heart rate, automatic and detailed sleep stage tracking, as well as automatic workouts through Jawbone's own multi-sensor platform. It uses bioimpedance sensors and offers a full week of battery life. UP3 supports free over-the-air firmware updates, and the multiple sensors can provide new experiences and functionalities. "We're delighted to bring UP by Jawbone to India, a market where consumers are both design savvy and hugely interested in the latest consumer technology. With heart disease and diabetes remaining two of the major causes of death in India, keeping a healthy and active lifestyle has never been more important. Our UP bands help people better understand their health and well-being by tracking sleep, activity, and nutrition along with clear tools - through our UP app and Smart Coach system - to help them take action and live better." said Travis Bogard, vice president of product management and strategy at Jawbone. http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/followceleb.cms?alias=UP3,Up2,Jawbone up,Jawbone
